title: What is Magnetic Path: Learning Magnetism, Mesmerismus, and Fascination for Personal and Professional Success?
first_phrase: This text describes a course that teaches techniques of magnetism and fascination. The course offers an international certification for completing both levels of Mesmerismus. The last 200 tokens contain information about the second step of Magnetic Path, which focuses on the Secrets of Fascination. The text explains the triadic process of fascination and its connection to multiple brain areas. The state of fascination is different from classic trance. The course provides exercises for rejuvenation, development of personal magnetism, and magnetic force and vitality. Additionally, the text mentions the third step of Magnetic Path, Quantum Presence, which teaches the alchemy of light and higher self-awareness.
content: How Long Two days First Day: Various fascination exercises Gypsy Hypnosis Raw fascination Donato’s Method How to use fascination for regression work Second Day : Types of gaze Amnesic fascination Di Pisa’s Healing Method Faria’s points Hypnomagnetism with fascination A powerful method against traumas Third eye techniques Working with mirrors QUANTUM PRESENCE– Master in QUANTUM PHYSIOLOGY –Magnetic Path Third STEP of the MAGNETIC PATH Presence and Alchemy of the Light What we call "presence" is the path of human development toward a higher self-awareness. It 's the culmination of all the traditions of self-seeking. It also is a state with practical consequences and verifiable, here are a few: An example: one of our employees in some matches in the world of karate (he was runner-up world of the world) went into a strange state: the time of others seemed slowed down, while its normal proceeded. The result? he always won. Many so-called "states of high performance" where a person is extremely capable (expressive, creative, attentive, able to exploit its potential) sometimes contain elements of the Way of the Presence although they are still on the initial part of the journey, because such a development guides towards a true rebirth of the person. Developing the means to get out from mental automaticity, presence gives us access to our real potential and then things that previously seemed impossible become possible and near. Much of human actions are performed mechanically in fact, as a succession of cause and effect. The consciousness of man is usually narrow and dominated by unconscious elements.
last_phrase: In conclusion, Quantum Presence offers a complete and practical approach towards developing one's presence and unlocking their full potential. The course covers various techniques such as magnetic massage, quantum psi, and NLP3, and provides a deep understanding of the concept of consciousness. By mastering these techniques, one can ultimately achieve a state of true self-awareness and tap into their highest level of performance. The course also introduces the concept of the Alchemy of Light and how it can facilitate the understanding of certain processes by using the power of light. Overall, Quantum Presence offers a comprehensive pathway for personal and professional growth.
